question: Suggest reagents to convert each of the following starting materials into the indicated product: **(a)** hexanoyl chloride into acetic hexanoic anhydride; **(b)** methyl hexanoate into *N*-methylhexanamide; **(c)** hexanoyl chloride into hexanal; **(d)** hexanenitrile into hexanoic acid; **(e)** hexanamide into hexanamine; **(f)** hexanamide into pentanamine; **(g)** ethyl hexanoate into 3-ethyl-3-octanol; **(h)** hexanenitrile into 1-phenyl-1-hexanone $\ce{[C_6H_5CO(CH_2)_4CH_3]}$.
